title: I was abused online for 'Welcome to Heathrow' poster
description: Syed Usman Shah says he was proud to appear in the campaign, but upset by what followed.
content:
A single social media post turned what had been one of Syed Usman Shah's "proudest moments" into one of the most overwhelming and upsetting.
It started when Shah, 35, was approached by Heathrow Airport to be part of their "Welcome" campaign.
The airp... [3960 chars]

title: Olivia Attwood: 'We shouldn't glamourise being reliant on other people'
description: The documentary host and presenter discusses female independence and snobbery about reality TV.
content:
In just a couple of years, Olivia Attwood has transformed from one of reality TV's most chaotic (and memorable) contestants to a documentary maker investigating some of society's most taboo topics.
Appearing on Love Island at the peak of its powers i... [5992 chars]

title: Chris Mason: Trump calls Starmer as US and Europe diverge on Iran strikes
description: The UK was not involved in, nor has it endorsed, the strikes on Iran by Israel and the US.
content:
The phone call between US President Donald Trump and Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer was brief, I am told, and was instigated by the White House.
Downing Street's public account of what was discussed was, to put it gently, rather broad: "They discuss... [643 chars]

title: Dozens dead in Iran school blast blamed on US and Israel strikes
description: There is no confirmation by the US or Israel of the strike on the school located near elite military troops.
content:
At least 108 people have died in an explosion at a school in southern Iran, according to a local prosecutor.
It happened as the US and Israel launched massive air strikes against the country.
President Masoud Pezeshkian said it was a "barbaric act" a... [2281 chars]

title: Pilot ‘crawls out’ after plane crashes on to beach in Gosport
description: Bystander describes ‘loud crashing sound from the rocks’ as light aircraft goes into sea at Lee-on-the-Solent
content:
A pilot survived after a light aircraft crashed on to a beach in Hampshire on Saturday.
The pilot had exited the aircraft before firefighters arrived and was subsequently assessed by the ambulance service, Hampshire and Isle of Wight fire and rescue ... [1122 chars]
